>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v2/request-queues/{queueId}/requests/{requestId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



<span class="openapi-clients-box"><span class="openapi-clients-box-heading">Clients</span><a href="https://docs.apify.com/api/client/python/reference/class/RequestQueueClientAsync#update" target="_blank"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apify/openapi/b1206ac2adf8f39b05e5a09bf32c2802af58d851/assets/python.svg" class="openapi-clients-box-icon" alt="Apify API Python Client Reference"/></a><a href="https://docs.apify.com/api/client/js/reference/class/RequestQueueClient#update" target="_blank"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apify/openapi/b1206ac2adf8f39b05e5a09bf32c2802af58d851/assets/javascript.svg" class="openapi-clients-box-icon" alt="Apify API JavaScript Client Reference" /></a></span><span id="/reference/request-queues/queue/update-request"></span><span id="/reference/request-queues/update-request"></span>Updates a request in a queue. Mark request as handled by setting
`request.handledAt = new Date()`.


If `handledAt` is set, the request will be removed from head of the queue.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"queueId","in":"path","description":"Queue ID or `username~queue-name`.","required":true,"style":"simple","schema":{"type":"string","example":"WkzbQMuFYuamGv3YF"}},{"name":"requestId","in":"path","description":"Request ID.","required":true,"style":"simple","schema":{"type":"string","example":"xpsmkDlspokDSmklS"}},{"name":"forefront","in":"query","description":"Determines if request should be added to the head of the queue or to the\nend. Default value is `false` (end of queue).\n","style":"form","explode":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"false"}},{"name":"clientKey","in":"query","description":"A unique identifier of the client accessing the request queue. It must\nbe a string between 1 and 32 characters long. This identifier is used to\ndetermine whether the queue was accessed by multiple clients. If\n`clientKey` is not provided,\n\nthe system considers this API call to come from a new client. For\ndetails, see the `hadMultipleClients` field returned by the [Get\nhead](#/reference/request-queues/queue-head) operation.\n","style":"form","explode":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"client-abc"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
